div.p: Explore our in-depth product value breakdowns and market insights.

div.style: position: sticky; top: 6rem; max-height: calc(100vh - 6rem); overflow: auto;

button.t-if: ( analysis.description and analysis.features) and not analysis.output

input.name: target_market
input.placeholder: e.g. Indonesia, South East Asia, etc...

textarea.name: initial_description
textarea.placeholder: Paste or type initial product description here...

textarea.name: features
textarea.placeholder: AI Generated list product features (leave blank for auto AI generated)...

option.t-att-selected: is_edit and analysis.lang_id and (language_rec.id == analysis.lang_id.id) or (not is_edit and language_rec.code == 'en_US')
